title: @DeepTerrorNami
body: I have a boards member who just admitted to boosting people's accounts by playing directly on their accounts. Its right there in his post. Would like to report. Do I need to submit a support ticket? Can I just give you the link and let you take care of it?

replies.body:
Hey MightySaturn - 

DeepTerrorNami is actually a player, but they do pop on the boards a lot to share information and help players where they can (which is awesome)! ^-^

For something like this, I would suggest contacting [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They would be the ones to investigate this type of behavior.
thanks. yea i think its ok that she didnt respond. i probably shouldnt single her out.
It's always okay to @ someone, if you know that it's their area of expertise. I have some people @ me to ask specific skins questions, and that's cool by me. :)

You all should offer her a job....

Nami is always quite civil, professional and polite in their excellent replies
A badge of honor especially considering the adolescent nature of most or the posts/posters in PB&M.

I mean, it's not like REDs are seen here very often....

;)
BS, she white knights almost all the posts on the PB&M.

Better than being an asshole, ain't it?

I can guarantee you wouldn't want me responding to your (figuratively speaking ofc) whiny crybaby posts, I'd hurt your feelings...

IDK you're being a total dick right now.
Kinda like what DTN does half of the time.

I mean looking at all your posts, you're kinda a sarcastic asshole. Including the post you just made.

Don't really make many posts, not worth the time.

If you really do want upvotes, circlejerking and meme/gif spamming is the way to go.
If explaining/clarifying the rules and giving tips on how to be a more positive player is being a white knight dick, then I'm happy to be a white knight dick :3
#Rekt
Upvote farm?
Downvote farm?

*Say something not circlejerk*
*Downvotes intensify*
I pity you.

Actually, you're a self-righteous sarcastic troll, that gets away with it because you link the riot's koran while you do it.

What you do on these boards is just as bad as the people who come on here hot and angry at a broken system trying to play pre-school teacher.

However, I believe you do represent the majority for people who regularly look at these forums, but an overwhelming minority of players. I regularly share your post with my "Small" group of friends to laugh at how out of touch you are with the **actual** community (not the board community).

Haven't really seen a disparity from actual community to real community since D3. But grats.
Pretty sure "she" is actually a he as are 95% of players {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

No, I think DTN's a she...also the poster said DTN was a she.

I mean, I'm not sure, should I call DTN an "it"?
That's.. not how you get a job. At all. It helps, but it's not even close to being the primary factor.

> [{quoted}](name=Narasimha,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=G39dWgsy,comment-id=00050000000000000001,timestamp=2016-05-13T20:57:29.078+0000)
>
> That's.. not how you get a job. At all. It helps, but it's not even close to being the primary factor.

Actually, Riot reached out to me, encouraged me to apply, and got me past the initial application screening process (jump straight to the design test and interview) based on a Boards post of mine.

There ended up not being an available internship position -> nothing I could get hired for even if they'd wanted me this summer but I'll do the same when next summer's internship applications are submitted.
Well, fuck em if they don't wanna pay for an employee.

Well, I'd imagine, filling out an application is a main factor. 
:D

lol...I got DV for not ragging on someone?

You kids are slapheads.
:D
Snowball.

I just wasn't around, or I would've responded. Tickets are your go-to option. I won't try to use Player Support contacts to fast-track a case unless absolutely necessary. It's also not easy to get a response from Keyru -_-

When submitting a ticket for an issue on the boards, please screenshot the offending content so they don't have to jump through hoops when the thread (which you also link) is inevitably deleted. Copy-pasting the name in and providing a link to their profile so "L" and "i" and "1" and special characters can't be confused is also a good idea.
Why is your name blue???????

They're an Arbiter. They're a player who has provided enough support to players over time that RIOT has recognized them an given them an official title so players know that they're getting quality support from someone who's not a RIOT employee.
She's a Boards Arbiter. Basically high level admins. Keep track of things and the sort.
Wise choice http://i.imgur.com/bb0uPs3.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=G39dWgsy,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-05-13T16:57:55.529+0000)

> DeepTerrorNami 


His name is blue, mine is not.

What sorcery is this?
They're a player volunteer. They help people out when they ask 'why did I get punished for this?'
Magic.~ Also, an awesome volunteer!
Confirmed witchcraft.
Or she found the moon stones.
Hey it's witchcraft!

Dude, I know in the past you said it was a joke...
But this is a shitty joke.

Destine-sama needs no allies or friends.

gg.
...Well, I don't see things ending well for you then.
The magics belonging to those deemed ~~worthy~~ *evil* enough to become [Arbiters](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/opVBd7rZ-introducing-the-arbiters).
Always use tickets not boards posts.  There are rules on the boards about name blaming. (Fine to post as long as you don't say their name though.

OP didn't name the person

OP didn't even link the post that they're referring to.

OP just asked what the proper procedure would be since they wished to report the person.
I hate people who just browse the boards LOOKING for stuff to be salty about.
Riot Support is on the top of the page. Use it.

> If explaining/clarifying the rules and giving tips on how to be a more positive player is being a white knight dick, then I'm happy to be a white knight dick :3

Yep,

Why focus on DTM if you have anything to say then just say it!  I'm as much a 'White Knight' so hit me up !

Dude stop using that term, https://www.kkkknights.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/KKK-Logo.png  because guess who else uses it?
EDIT: Riot and everyone else just chill, I'm using this as an example of what not to do, I do not condone racism or any action played out by the Klu Klux Klan. I promote equality and am just using this as a helpful source.
That's not a reason.
Do you have any idea what the KKK did/does? They brutally murdered minorities for practically no reason at all.
Enough with extremists taking away parts of our language. The reason why "white knight" shouldn't be used is that it is dumb in the meaning that WE give to it.
